com.networks.p2pchat

Class ConnectionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.networks.p2pchat.ConnectionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConnectionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Connection listener class, will listen on a particular port for incoming connections, when one is received it will pass the newly opened socket to the post office class to be handled there.
    Author:
    Anthony

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionListener(PostOffice postOffice, int port)
      Constructor - takes in the holding class and the listening port.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the listening socket, and the thread that is running.
      void run()
      Run loop for the listen thread, listens for new connections and passes the sockets of new connections back to post office.
      void start()
      Start the thread.
